thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 22 of 227
thread.title: Kaela M.
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kaela M.

author: Kaela M.
title: Kaela M.
text: I just bought a house and am moving in. I needed to quickly find furniture and with everything going on this could have been very stressful. Luckily I had a great experience that wasn't stressful in the least. The guy helping me was awesome and really fun. I did have to special order a small dining room table and chairs. My living room set was at my house the next day! The automated updating was great. I was very happy with Gardner-White and Ron my super cool sales guy. Will recommend to others and be back in the future.
